subject: Unable to connect Snowflake data source
description: Hi, I'm trying to set up a Snowflake connection but I keep getting authentication errors. I've double-checked my credentials and they seem correct. Can someone help me troubleshoot this?

subject: How to create data lineage visualization?
description: I'm new to Atlan and want to understand how to create and view data lineage for my tables. Could you provide step-by-step instructions?

subject: API rate limits are too restrictive!
description: Your API rate limits are ridiculous! I can barely get any work done. We're paying for this service and expect better performance. This needs to be fixed immediately!

subject: SSO integration with OKTA not working
description: We've configured SSO with OKTA but users are unable to authenticate. The setup seems correct based on the documentation. Getting error: 'Invalid SAML response'.

subject: Best practices for data governance setup
description: We're implementing data governance across our organization. What are the recommended best practices for setting up data policies and data stewardship in Atlan?

subject: Power BI connector showing empty datasets
description: The Power BI connector is connected but not showing any datasets or reports. The connection status shows as active. This is blocking our entire analytics team.

subject: How to use Python SDK for bulk operations?
description: I need to perform bulk updates on asset metadata using the Python SDK. What's the most efficient way to do this? Any code examples would be helpful.

subject: Glossary terms not syncing across environments
description: We have glossary terms defined in our dev environment but they're not appearing in production. Is there a way to sync these automatically?

subject: Sensitive data classification not working
description: The automatic sensitive data classification isn't detecting PII in our tables. We have columns with SSNs and credit card numbers that should be flagged. Very concerning for compliance!

subject: Question about data catalog search functionality
description: I'm curious about the search capabilities in the data catalog. Can I search using custom metadata fields? Also, does it support fuzzy matching?

subject: Databricks Unity Catalog integration failing
description: Tried to integrate with Databricks Unity Catalog but getting connection timeouts. This is urgent as we have a demo tomorrow with the executive team!

subject: How to set up automated data quality checks?
description: We want to implement automated data quality monitoring. What are the steps to set up data quality checks and how can we get alerts when issues are detected?
